Body:
sino, angles = create_test_sino_3d()
parameters = get_test_parameter_set(2)
rref = list()
for p in parameters:
    fref = odtbrain.backpropagate_3d(sino, angles, padval=0, dtype=np.
        float64, onlyreal=True, **p)
    rref.append(cutout(fref))
dataref = np.array(rref).flatten().view(float)
r = list()
for p in parameters:
    f = odtbrain.backpropagate_3d_tilted(sino, angles, padval=0, dtype=np.
        float64, onlyreal=True, **p)
    r.append(cutout(f))
data = np.array(r).flatten().view(float)
assert np.allclose(data, dataref)
